word_mean: 水痘：由疱疹病毒(水痘-带状疱疹病毒)引起的一种接触传染性很强的疾病，特征是在17～21天潜伏期后的数天至一周中，分批出现主要限于面部及躯干部的大量水疱疹。此种损伤开始为斑点，迅速变成水疱，然后结痂。在儿童本病常呈良性，但婴儿、原患恶性病的儿童以及成人可能病情严重
特别是成人可能并发水痘肺炎和脑炎

sentence.Network_en: Thomas came down with chickenpox at the weekend.
sentence.Network_cn: 托马斯周末染上了水痘。

sentence.Network_en: Then both groups were vaccinated with a chickenpox vaccine.
sentence.Network_cn: 然后两组都接种水痘疫苗.

sentence.Network_en: Chickenpox : If you haen't had chickenpox or shingles, this is recommended.
sentence.Network_cn: 水痘: 未患过水痘或带状疱疹者推荐接种此疫苗.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 水痘(Chickenpox)http://www.sina.com.cn 2005年04月07日 11:38 《呵护宝宝》 这是一种儿童常见的传染性疾病。它有大约3周的潜伏期,而且只有中度症状。它的.
and they suspect , but don't yet know , that the type that causes chickenpox doesn't either .他们怀疑，但是尚未知晓，能引起水痘的也没有作用。
chickenpox 儿童, chickenpox 水逗, chickenpox 水疮

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: probably so named because of its mildness, as compared to smallpox

entry.def: Chickenpox is a disease which gives you a high temperature and red spots that itch.

means.word_mean: 1. an acute contagious disease caused by herpes varicella zoster virus; causes a rash of vesicles on the face and body
